property.name: variant
property.label: Display Option
property.description: Select the default format of the card. Options are: None (flat) or Featured (drop shadow), Outline (flat with border).

property.name: titletext
property.label: Leaderboard Title
property.description: Title text to display for this Leaderboard. If empty, title will not display.

property.name: subtitletext
property.label: Leaderboard Subtitle
property.description: Subtitle text to display for this Leaderboard. If empty, subtitle will not display.

property.name: headeralign
property.label: Title Alignment
property.description: Alignment for the Title and Subtitle text. Options: Left, Right, Center.

property.name: sourceAdventureId
property.label: Filter By Source Adventure
property.description: The ID of the source adventure to be displayed. If blank, all adventures will display.

property.name: showInactiveAdventures
property.label: Include Inactive Adventures
property.description: Include adventures that are marked as inactive in the leaderboard.

property.name: defaultSort
property.label: Default Sort
property.description: Default sort for the list. Options are: Task Percent Complete Descending, Module Percent Complete Descending.
property.datasource: Task Percent Complete Descending,Module Percent Complete Descending

property.name: ownerNameLabel
property.label: Owner Name Column Label
property.description: Label for owner name column. Leave blank to remove column.

property.name: ownerImageLabel
property.label: Owner Image Column Label
property.description: Label for owner Image column. Leave blank to remove column and image.

property.name: ownerIconShape
property.label: Owner Icon Shape
property.description: Choose the shape of the owner icon/image. Options: Circle or Square

property.name: ownerIconSize
property.label: Owner Icon Size
property.description: The size of the owner icon (XS, S, M, L)

property.name: adventureNameLabel
property.label: Adventure Name Column Label
property.description: Enter a label to display the Adventure name column.

property.name: showAdventuresNameLink
property.label: Show Adventure Name Link
property.description: If checked, Adventure Name will display as a link to allow navigate to the detail page.

property.name: adventureTitleLabel
property.label: Adventure Title Column Label
property.description: Enter a label to display the Adventure title column.

property.name: showAdventuresTitleLink
property.label: Show Adventure Title Link
property.description: If checked, Adventure Title will display as a link to allow navigate to the detail page.

property.name: adventureDetailPageURL
property.label: Adventure Detail Page URL
property.description: Enter adventure detail page URL.

property.name: activeFlagLabel
property.label: Active Flag Column Label
property.description: Enter a label to display the Active flag in the list.

property.name: taskPercentCompletedLabel
property.label: Percent Completed Tasks Column Label
property.description: Enter a label to display the percent of completed tasks column.

property.name: completedTaskNumLabel
property.label: Number Completed Tasks Column Label
property.description: Enter a label to display the number of completed tasks column.

property.name: modulePercentCompletedLabel
property.label: Percent Completed Modules Column Label
property.description: Enter a label to display the percent of completed modules column.

property.name: completedModulesNumLabel
property.label: Number Completed Modules Column Label
property.description: Enter a label to display the number of completed modules column.

property.name: lastActivityLabel
property.label: Last Activity Column Label
property.description: Enter a label to display the last activity column. This column displays the last updated date for the Adventure.

property.name: numberOfRecords
property.label: Number of Records
property.description: Number of adventures to include in the list.

property.name: height
property.label: Leaderboard Height
property.description: Height of the leaderboard component in pixels. For example, 400px.

property.name: customClass
property.label: Custom Class Name
property.description: Custom CSS class name. Usually remains blank.
